Features: 18mm thick wooden top in laminate finish with PVC lipping
Based on metal structure and rectangular metal legs with metal inlays formed from 1.Smm metal sheets in electrostatic powder coated paint
Attached side includes 3 lockable drawers & cabinet with lockable leaf
Available with front modesty panel in laminate finish (Optional)
Including concealed cable management system with aluminum flap
Excluding electric source and grommet power outlet
Can be matched with corresponding pedestal, credenza and coffee table
